markdown:
The club's membership structure includes various categories such as Foundation, Golfing Senior, Social, and Social Former Foundation Members. New members are required to pay an initiation fee unless waived by the Board, with membership becoming active upon payment receipt. A New Member Orientation is mandatory within two weeks following payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

I. MEMBERSHIP CATEGORIES & INITIATION FEES
- Foundation Membership:
  - Transfer fee equal to the initiation fee for Foundation Membership is due for approved transfers to a child [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- Golfing Senior, Social, Social Former Foundation Members:
  - Initiation fees and specific percentages are not provided.

II. TRANSFER FEES & SCENARIOS
- Foundation Transfer to a Child:
  - Transfer fee equals the initiation fee for Foundation Membership plus applicable taxes [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- Transfer to Surviving Spouse:
  - Surviving spouse of a Foundation, Golfing Senior, Social, or Social Former Foundation Member may request transfer to surviving spouse status.

III. REINSTATEMENT PROVISIONS
- No specific details provided in the sources.

IV. PAYMENT & BILLING REQUIREMENTS
- Membership activation upon payment receipt [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- New Member Orientation required within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

V. AGE-BASED PROVISIONS & RESTRICTIONS
- No age requirements mentioned in the sources.

VI. SPECIAL PROGRAMS & PROVISIONS
- No specific details provided in the sources.

VII. ADDITIONAL FEES & REQUIREMENTS
- No additional fees or requirements mentioned in the sources.
